content: ***they are a part of the white winter set- get the free patterns pdfs for all the 3 hat wrist warmers and leg warmers on my website white winter set free download 1 easy crochet gloves made using only single and double crochets these fingerless wrist warmers make a good present for friends and family to keep warm this winter these fingerless gloves leave the fingers free to use the phone while keeping hands warm they can be made in any other color this mittens work up fast and are fun to make they are seamless worked in rounds skill level easy beginner friendly finished size- s m l xl for adults *material yarn any chunky or bulky or weight 5 yarn of choice can be used suggested yarn lion brand hue + me/ lion brand jiffy/ gentle yarn by big twist i have used a local yarn which is 100% acrylic yardage 145 m/ 158 yards in 100/ 3 5 oz of yarn each skein has 100 g approx amount needed 80 92 116 138 g or 127 146 183 218 yards more or less may be needed depending on alterations made to fit crochet hook 6 mm or j size hook adjust size to match gauge notions tapestry needle scissors measuring tape *pattern details 1 the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english this is a 8 page pdf pattern 2 it has written instructions for the crochet pattern and detailed pattern row by row and round by round 3 it does not include finished product 4 it can be made in any similar yarn suitable for your hook 5 a youtube tutorial is available and linked in pattern visit my youtube channel 2 get the free pattern ebook for white winter set 3 visit instagram 4 1 https //letsallcrochet com/white-winter-set/ 2 https //www youtube com/c/letsallcrochet 3 https //letsallcrochet com/white-winter-set/ 4 https //www instagram com/letsallcrochet1989/
